content: TE-C TI Tile chisels Self-sharpening SDS Plus (TE-C) tile chisels for scraping away surface materials ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Chisels and rod drivers- - - ### FEATURES:Features Self-sharpening cutting edge – work more efficiently and for longer with the same chisel, no resharpening or rehardening necessary Better ergonomics – angled offset head allows comfortable work flush on the surface High-alloy steel – for more reliable and consistent chisel quality Upgraded breaking power – extra-tough connection end transfers more force from the tool to the chisel Multiple widths and lengths available – use shorter bits for best energy transmission and increased longevity, and longer ones for piercing deeper or reaching into tight spaces Applications Removing tile, laminate or other composite material Flush surface material removal, such as weld spatter, scale or concrete formwork seepage For use with SDS Plus (TE-C) electric jackhammers, breakers or rotary hammers ### TECHNICAL DATA: Connection end: TE-C (SDS Plus) Application: Tile removal Length: 7.1 in Technical Data | Connection end | TE-C (SDS Plus) | Application | Tile removal | Product Class | Premium ### ITEMS- 282307 - Tile chisel TE-CX TI 18/4 - Package Size 1 pc - 2428754 - Tile chisel TE-C TI 18/4 - Package Size 1 pc - 282308 - Tile chisel TE-CX TI 18/6 - Package Size 1 pc - 2428755 - Tile chisel TE-C TI 18/6 - Package Size 1 pc - 282309 - Tile chisel TE-CX TI 18/8 - Package Size 1 pc - 2429750 - Tile chisel TE-C TI 18/8 - Package Size 1 pc
